title: IBD Rating Upgrades: Alphabet Cl A Shows Improved Technical Strength
text:
BREAKING: Futures Loom After 'Good' Inflation Data     In a welcome move, Alphabet Cl A (GOOGL) saw its Relative Strength Rating improve from 67 to 72 on Tuesday. X



 IBD's unique RS Rating identifies technical performance by showing how a stock's price action over the last 52 weeks compares to that of the other stocks in our database. Decades of market research shows that the stocks that go on to make the biggest gains tend to have an RS Rating of over 80 as they launch their biggest climbs. See if Alphabet Cl A can continue to show renewed price strength and clear that threshold. How To Invest In Stocks In Both Bull And Bear Markets Alphabet Cl A is building a consolidation with a 153.78 buy point. See if it can clear the breakout price in heavy volume. In terms of top and bottom line numbers, the company has posted four quarters of increasing earnings growth. Sales growth has also moved higher over the same time frame. The company earns the No. 8 rank among its peers in the Internet-Content industry group. Meta Platforms (META), Kanzhun ADR (BZ) and Direct Digital (DRCT) are among the top 5 highly rated stocks within the group.
